display_long_description:
Neon Cipher is an action-packed puzzle-platformer designed for smooth and engaging gameplay. Across 50 levels, you'll use third- and first-person mechanics to solve intricate puzzles and battle enemies blocking your path.

As a new recruit in a small team of hackers, your mission is to infiltrate XE_CORP's archive database and retrieve vital information for the Edenite Rebellion, crucial to its survival.

# Third-Person Gameplay
[media]
Use classic third-person controls to move your character around, attack, enemies and interact with objects. Collect all the keys to open the door and complete each cipher.

# First-Person Gameplay
[media]
Sometimes your character may need a little help. Reach into the cipher with your controllers to move platforms. Also you can stun enemies to make the fighting a little easier.

# Editor
[media]
Create and play your own ciphers using the built-in editor.

*A note on legacy headset support:
Please note, versions of Neon Cipher for Meta Quest 2 and Pro are still in development. We hope to bring them to you as soon as we can!
